message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.Distributed Systems 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) - This paper discusses the development of a distributed computing system based on BOINC, which falls under the scope of distributed computing. 
2. cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science) - The paper specifically targets the High Energy Physics (HEP) community and proposes a tool to process large amounts of data, which falls under the scope of computational science. 
3. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - The paper mentions the importance of security in the proposed tool, which falls under the scope of cryptography and security. 
4. cs.SE (Software Engineering) - The paper discusses the design principles of the proposed tool, which falls under the scope of software engineering. 
5. cs.Distributed Systems - The paper discusses the development of a distributed computing system, which falls under the scope of distributed systems.
